page.title: 04SW BASINGSTOKE: EDUCATION 1
page.content: The area contains 7 schools - 1.Beech Down Primary 2. Hatch Warren Primary 3.Chalk Ridge Primary 4.Manor Field Infant 5.Manor Field Junior 6.Cliddesden Primary and 7.Brighton Hill Comprehensive. Of the six primary schools, all are of modern design with the exception of {Cliddesden} which is a village shool of traditional design built in 1897 and draws children aged 5-11 from the surrounding villages. At present there are 72 pupils. All the other Primary schools serve the modern housing estates in which they are situated. The predominant building materials being those of glass and metal. Many temporary classrooms are required to house children in these rapidly growing residential areas.
